issue.title: Allow for custom flatc compiler
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-285](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-285). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow maven project needs a flatc compiler, which it download from maven central, but the compiler is not available for all platforms.

As a temporary fix, a user should be able to specifiy where flatc compiler is located and disable the automatic attempt at downloading flatc
